email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi Lisa, We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao on CFR terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for a laycan of November 10-15? Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN GLORY, DWT 180,000, LOA 290m, for your shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 25/MT. Laycan is November 10-15 as requested. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi Lisa, Thanks for the quick response. USD 25/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi John, Given the current market conditions, I can offer a reduced rate of USD 23/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body: Hi Lisa, USD 23/MT works for us. Please proceed with the booking for the OCEAN GLORY with a laycan of November 10-15. Kindly send over the charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN GLORY
email_chain.body: Hi John, Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Best, Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN GLORY
email_chain.body: Hi Lisa, The charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help! Best, John
